title: Remake isn't working
body: Afk from the start of the game and we cant remake, no forced to lose LP because were fighting a 4v5. Thanks riot, Fucked us once again.

replies.body: It sucks to hear that remake didn't go through.  It's likely that the leaver wasn't gone for long enough or a vote didn't pass, and I'm not aware of any issues with the system itself.  If you need any context, feel free to hit us up through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'll be happy to take a look individually with you!

Same here. Just lost a 4vs5 game. Our jungler never made a step, never bought any item. The only thing she did was constant reconnecting and disconnecting. It was one of my promo games, come on Riot! :(
